interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/08/27
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'}
Review Text: While yes, it deep cleaned my skin it also dried it out terribly.  Great lather but I couldn't wash it off fast enough. I nearly vomited. Its truely awful. Wet dog and day old beach seaweed aroma. I won't use anymore of this product and I had to use another cleanser just to remove the smell.
Review Title: Fragrance please. This smells like wet dog
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Nano Botanix | Recovery Night Gel Moisturizer - with Hyaluronic Acid, Dual Peptides, and Color Correction - plus Aloe, Licorice, and Green Tea Extracts - Recover and Repair - 1.7 OZ (50mL)
Nano Botanix
{'Brand': 'Nano Botanix', 'Unit Count': '1.70 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 1.5 x 1.42 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850034727271'}
There's really no fragrance which is kind of a bummer BUT the gel is light weight, soaks in well and hydrates beautifully.  I love this product line and tried this as an alternative to the night serum. I love both.  This seems to absorb quicker into my skin. Leaves no greasy residue,  not sticky. Super soft. I highly recommend this and all of their products.  I'm 54 and am enjoying more glowing, youthful looking skin.
After 2 weeks I can see a nice decrease in fine lines
GOMAY Hydrating Amino Acid Foaming Facial Cleanser, Daily Face Wash for Makeup Remover with Face Cleansing Brush
GO MAY
{'Brand': 'GO MAY', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Oil-free,Soap-free', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6 inches; 8.96 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GM-FC03', 'UPC': '633183294814'}
Great on sensitive skin. I love the scrubber. Soft silicone like fingers that massage your skin as you wash. All in one,  I love it.  Easy to dispense and fits well in hand. Cap to keep it sterile.  Great product. Great value for the money. Not harsh but deep cleaning.
Easy to use, no fragrance,  deep clean
VOFEL Jelly Masks for Facials Mask Powder for Moisturizing Anti Aging Jelly Face Mask Peel Off 9 Pcs
VOFEL
{'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Vanilla,Lemon', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.46 x 1.46 inches; 5.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456407264'}
Dries to powder, like clay. Re-wet it then after a minute, it loosened up and could be torn off. Didnt hydrate, just dried out my skin. Didn't notice any lightening of my skin.
Dries hard. Re-wet then tears off. Faux fragrances

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Age Group**: 54 years old
- **Skin Care Focus**: Continues to prioritize hydration, recovery, and repair in facial care with an emphasis on maintaining moisture balance.
- **Preferred Product Characteristics**: Values lightweight, non-greasy formulations for sensitive skin. Recent negative experiences with products that contain fragrances highlight an increasing sensitivity, particularly after a recent purchase that resulted in discomfort and dissatisfaction.
- **Product Usage**: Actively uses night moisturizers and serums, with a commitment to a comprehensive skincare routine. The latest interaction underscores the need for effective cleansing products that do not compromise skin hydration.
- **Scent Preference**: Has become increasingly averse to fragrances, especially after encountering products with undesirable scents that adversely affected usability. 
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Generally high in satisfaction, but recent experiences have led to a more critical evaluation of product effectiveness, especially concerning hydration and the overall condition of the skin.
- **Brand Loyalty**: Retains loyalty to brands known for consistency and efficacy in meeting hydration needs.
- **Evaluation of Products**: Engages in thoughtful assessment of product performance; recent feedback suggests a cautious and discerning approach towards products that do not deliver on moisturizing claims or have poor scent profiles.

This updated profile reflects a more refined focus on scent sensitivity and performance in achieving hydration, underscoring the user’s commitment to quality skincare solutions.
